0.description: Move to the beginning of the line

^.description: Move to the first non-blank character of the line

$.description: Move to the end of the line

gg.description: Move to the first line of the document

G.description: Move to the last line of the document

H.description: Move to the top of the screen

M.description: Move to the middle of the screen

L.description: Move to the bottom of the screen

I.description: Insert at the beginning of the line

A.description: Insert at the end of the line

o.description: Insert a new line below the current line

O.description: Insert a new line above the current line

r.description: Replace the character under the cursor

x.description: Delete the character under the cursor

dw.description: Delete from the cursor to the end of the word

D.description: Delete from the cursor to the end of the line

yw.description: Yank from the cursor to the end of the word

n.description: Repeat the last search in the same direction

N.description: Repeat the last search in the opposite direction

:s/old/new/g.description: Replace all occurrences of 'old' with 'new' in the current line

:%s/old/new/g.description: Replace all occurrences of 'old' with 'new' in the entire document

:s/old/new/gc.description: Replace all occurrences of 'old' with 'new' in the current line with confirmation

:%s/old/new/gc.description: Replace all occurrences of 'old' with 'new' in the entire document with confirmation

:q.description: Quit (if no changes have been made)
